about_the_game:
Bomb Fight is a local-multiplayer action party game inspired by the 16bits era and the classics Bomberman, combined with game-changer power skills.
Fight up to 12 players on 6 game modes.

You can play with up to 12 controllers and up to 4 players on one keyboard. Two players can
share one controller. So 12 people can play simultaneously with just 1 keyboard (4 players) and 4 controllers (8 players, 2 by controller).
Any configurations is possible!
Every map is playable 2-12 players.

FEATURES

  • Over 40 different maps
  • 12-player local multiplayer
  • Add bots with or without your team
  • Multiple game-changing power-ups
  • Multiple game-changing power-skills
  • 6 game modes
  • 12 controllers support (4 XInput and 8 Direct Input)
  • 4 players keyboard support
  • Share one controller with a friend
  • Unlimited framerate
  • Steam Achievements

GAME MODES


FFA - Free for all and last man standing
TEAM - Team up with your buddies in any configuration.
SCORE - Kill others to score, or lose score by killing yourself.
COLOR - Colour as many tiles as possible before dying.
RUSH - Rush and stick to the designated area for 15 seconds to win. If you die, you'll ressurect after 3 seconds.
BANK - Collect five coins to win. If you die, you'll ressurect after 3 seconds.

POWER-SKILLS


FIRE - Speed up all bombs wick, or instant explode those who are drop since too long.
ICE - Freeze all bombs wick.
ELECTRIC - Change randomly all bombs wick, or instant explode those who are since from too long.
WIND - Blowing up, down, right or left all bombs and items.
BLACK HOLE - Teleport all the livings on other position.
EARTH - Transform all bombs in the circle into box.

Those power-ups can be deactivated.
